pageContext.title: In brief: Gobi Partners makes first Pakistani investment, leads $1.5m round in travel startup
pageContext.content:
Sastaticket.pk, an online travel agency (OTA) based in Karachi, Pakistan, announced today that it has secured US$1.5 million for its series A round, led by regional venture capital firm Gobi Partners. The investment marks Gobiâ€™s first venture into the Pakistani market.

Founded in September 2016 by brothers Shazil and Bilal Mehkri, Sastaticket.pk offers domestic travelers a way to book and pay for flights and hotels instantly online. Ever since its launch in 2016, the platform has grown its gross merchandise volume by 125 percent year-on-year, and the number of orders by 155 percent year-on-year, and has over one million flight searches per month.

Source: Press release

seo.title: Gobi Partners leads series A round in Sastaticket
seo.description: The platform has grown its gross merchandise volume by 125 percent year-on-year.
